perfil: DevOps Developer con 8+ años en infraestructura TI y 4+ años especializado en DevOps/SRE. Diseño e implemento pipelines CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code y plataformas contenerizadas en entornos híbridos. Certificado por Google Cloud. Aplico Schema-Driven Development como metodología para despliegues rápidos, reproducibles y auditables.
perfil_ats: DevOps Developer con 8+ años de experiencia en infraestructura TI y 4+ años especializado en DevOps Engineering / SRE. Experiencia comprobada en pipelines CI/CD (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions), Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Ansible), contenerización (Docker, Kubernetes, Helm) y GitOps (ArgoCD). Certificado por Google Cloud en GKE, Terraform, Apigee X y DevOps. Dominio de Python, Go y Bash para tooling de plataforma. Observabilidad con ELK Stack y Grafana. Automatización RPA (Playwright) y pipelines ETL. Infraestructura híbrida Linux. Disponible para roles DevOps Developer, SRE, Platform Engineer o Cloud Engineer. Abierto a trabajo remoto internacional.

candidate_alignment.stack_core: Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible, Helm, ArgoCD
candidate_alignment.certificaciones_resumen: Google Cloud (GKE, Terraform, Apigee, DevOps), Coursera (Linux), EF SET (B2)

logros: Diseñé e implementé +15 pipelines CI/CD (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions) con quality gating, E2E testing y rollback automático, reduciendo fallos en despliegue ~40%.
Administré infraestructura híbrida de +50 servidores Linux; implementé IaC con Terraform y Ansible, alcanzando 95% de despliegues reproducibles.
Contenerización de +10 servicios con Docker/Kubernetes; definí Helm charts y estrategias blue/green/canary con ArgoCD, reduciendo incidentes en producción ~30%.
Implementé observabilidad centralizada (ELK Stack, Grafana) con alertas preventivas y playbooks RCA, reduciendo MTTR de ~4h a ~45min en servicios críticos.
Automaticé validación E2E con Playwright (+200 test cases) y pipelines ETL procesando +500K eventos/mes para dashboards de auditoría operacional.
Documenté +20 plantillas IaC y runbooks; lideré workshops cross-team de gobernanza de despliegues, adoptados por 3 equipos.
Soporte y operación de plataformas IVR (+2M llamadas/mes) y middleware; participé en +30 pruebas de integración y automatización de tareas operativas recurrentes.

github.bio: DevOps • Schema-Driven Development • CI/CD • GitOps • Containerization (K8s, Docker, Helm) • GCP • Python • Go

repos_destacados.descripcion: Minimalist E-Commerce Platform designed for demonstration and testing purposes.
Schema-Driven Digital CV — Datos en JSON, presentación en HTML.

en.perfil: DevOps Developer with 8+ years in IT infrastructure and 4+ years specialized in DevOps/SRE. I design and implement CI/CD pipelines, Infrastructure as Code and containerized platforms in hybrid environments. Google Cloud certified. I apply Schema-Driven Development as a methodology for fast, reproducible and auditable deployments.
en.perfil_ats: DevOps Developer with 8+ years of IT infrastructure experience and 4+ years specialized in DevOps Engineering / SRE. Proven experience in CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions), Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Ansible), containerization (Docker, Kubernetes, Helm) and GitOps (ArgoCD). Google Cloud certified in GKE, Terraform, Apigee X and DevOps. Proficient in Python, Go and Bash for platform tooling. Observability with ELK Stack and Grafana. RPA automation (Playwright) and ETL pipelines. Hybrid Linux infrastructure. Available for DevOps Developer, SRE, Platform Engineer or Cloud Engineer roles. Open to international remote work.

logros: Designed and implemented 15+ CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions) with quality gating, E2E testing and automatic rollback, reducing deployment failures by ~40%.
Managed hybrid infrastructure of 50+ Linux servers; implemented IaC with Terraform and Ansible, achieving 95% reproducible deployments.
Containerized 10+ services with Docker/Kubernetes; defined Helm charts and blue/green/canary strategies with ArgoCD, reducing production incidents by ~30%.
Implemented centralized observability (ELK Stack, Grafana) with preventive alerting and RCA playbooks, reducing MTTR from ~4h to ~45min on critical services.
Automated E2E validation with Playwright (200+ test cases) and ETL pipelines processing 500K+ events/month for operational audit dashboards.
Documented 20+ IaC templates and runbooks; led cross-team deployment governance workshops, adopted by 3 teams.
Support and operation of IVR platforms (2M+ calls/month) and middleware; participated in 30+ integration tests and automation of recurring operational tasks.
